name: spliit
description: Spliit is a self-hosted bill splitting and expense sharing app for groups. It helps track balances, settlements, and shared purchases through a tidy web UI.
features: Expense splitting: Divides bills and expenses among group members.
Group management: Creates groups for trips, roommates, or shared expenses.
Balance tracking: Calculates who owes whom and by how much.
Settlement suggestions: Recommends optimal payment plan to settle all debts.
Multiple currencies: Handles expenses in different currencies with conversion.
Receipt uploads: Attaches receipt photos to expense entries.
Expense categories: Organizes spending by category for better tracking.
Unequal splits: Divides expenses by custom percentages or amounts.
Activity feed: Shows chronological history of all group expenses.
Export reports: Downloads expense summaries and settlement reports.
Email notifications: Alerts members when expenses are added or settled.
Mobile friendly: Manages expenses from smartphones and tablets.
